column4: i have definatly had some machines not like some usb sticks.. that did boot in other machines.
Vendor bios differances and quirks.. is the logic i imagine.
I tend to just set up a grub2 flash drive to boot iso files these days.
or i just dd the 11.10 iso image to flash :)
VLC downloads a boatload of extra codecs!
Yes, and it works sweet with VLC in Windows.  i had to grab extra drivers, however.
yep. $14 from qvc.com - its not best quality.. but hay.. for $14 what do ya expect
i don't know.  As long as i can read the text "Emergency button" on the Jump5 but, it's good.
Have you ever watched TV with Ubuntu?
ive used tv tuner cards with Mythbuntu in the past.
Does Myth.tv/Mythbuntu have a huge download size?
but nothing in the last 2+ years. i need to get a new video capture/tuner card some day
